document_data.mainbody:
Cheron was a Netherese fighter and weaponsmith who worked at Dundadens Armory in Karsus Enclave until its destruction in .
Cheron worked alongside Sleda to meet the demand for Rualadeens blades. Though the pair were proficient smiths in their own right, Rualadeen still contributed to their projects in order to ensure the highest quality.
